GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.4.208
GSD.description:
iavf: Fix handling of dummy receive descriptors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.208 by commit d88d59faf4e6f9cc4767664206afdb999b10ec77, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit efa14c3985828da3163f5372137cb64d992b0f79. For more details please see the references link.
